summary: This bill, the Streamlining Program Efficiency and Expanding Deployment for BEAD Act (SPEED for BEAD Act), amends the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act to improve the Broadband Equity, Access, and Deployment Program. It redefines "gigabit-level broadband service", modifies program names, clarifies funds usage, reforms project size definitions, prohibits certain conditions on grants related to prevailing wages, labor agreements, and other factors, and clarifies that all technologies are eligible for broadband deployment. It also prevents the regulation of broadband service rates.
